law.catch_line: In a temporary or final order or decree, each provision that concerns the family home or family use ...
law.text:
In a temporary or final order or decree, each provision that concerns the family home or family use personal property is subject, as the circumstances and justice may require, to:
the terms and conditions that the court sets;
the time limits that the court sets, subject to § 8-210 of this subtitle; and
modification or dissolution by the court.
